item.title: Issue with Project Accounting Cost Category and Fee ID
item.description:
Last week, a client contacted me with a peculiar problem in Project Accounting. While their actual billings and payments/receipts matched in summary and detail, running the Cash Apply reconciliation (Tools»Routines»Project»PA Reconcile) incorrectly recalculated the payments/receipts as less than the actual billings. This discrepancy, equal to the “FREIGHT” fee charged on projects, was especially noticeable on projects with a single invoice and payment. We investigated the database, comparing the “FREIGHT” fee setup to other fees, but found no differences...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/issue-with-project-accounting-cost-category-and-fee-id/
